short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you to drink water at set intervals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hydration Reminder
Stay healthy and hydrated throughout the day with Hydration Reminder! This lightweight Chrome extension helps you build better hydration habits by sending you periodic reminders to drink water.

Features:
Customizable schedule: Set your start and end times to fit your daily routine.
Adjustable frequency: Choose the number of glasses (1â€“60) you'd like to drink within your chosen timeframe.
Easy-to-use interface: Quickly configure your hydration goals with a simple settings menu.
Notifications: Receive non-intrusive reminders to drink water, keeping your health on track.
Save settings: Your preferences are preserved, even when Chrome is closed and reopened.

Keep yourself hydrated and boost your focus and energy levels by using Hydration Reminder!
